definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
steel (as raw material)/steel sheets, bars, tubes, ingots, wire etc

sentences.english: After making some simplifying assumptions, this paper obtains the fatigue life of steel towers.
sentences.chinese: 在作了一些簡化假設後，得到了鋼塔架疲勞壽命。

sentences.english: Quenching degree is mainly determined by chemical composition and organization structure of steel.
sentences.chinese: 淬透性主要取決於鋼的化學成分和鋼的組織結構。

sentences.english: Quenching degree is mainly determined by chemical composition and organization structure of steel.
sentences.chinese: 淬透性主要取決於鋼的化學成分和鋼的組織結構。

sentences.english: The main characteristics of the rail steel are low manganese and high carbon which content is being closed to eutectoid.
sentences.chinese: 其成分特徵是碳含量在共析點左右的高碳低錳鋼軌鋼。

sentences.english: Steel and concrete have almost the same rate of contraction and expansion.
sentences.chinese: 鋼和混凝土有幾乎相同的收縮率和膨脹率。

sentences.english: Use the battens of two by one inches and steel nails for nailing to the wall.
sentences.chinese: 由一個使用條板二移動和釘牢的鋼釘子對牆壁。

sentences.english: As a result, it can decrease production routine and reduce production costs, which will lay foundations for practical research on parts such as crank axle.
sentences.chinese: 本研究爲曲軸等非調質鋼零件的實用性研究提供參考。

sentences.english: Structural steels can be subdivided into constructional steel and machinery steel.
sentences.chinese: 結構鋼還可分爲建築用鋼和機械用鋼。

sentences.english: The cylinder head is attached to the block with high-tensile steel studs.
sentences.chinese: 氣缸蓋與氣缸體用高強度的鋼螺栓縛連結。

sentences.english: Is that box made of tin or steel?
sentences.chinese: 這個箱子是白鐵皮做的還是鋼做的？

sentences.english: The Calcium Oxide is used to mix oxygen with the molten steel.
sentences.chinese: 這些生石灰是用來將氧混合在熔化的鋼水中。

sentences.english: The cutters have very hard teeth made from special steel or from diamonds .
sentences.chinese: 刀具上有用特種鋼或金鋼石製造的非常堅硬的齒。

sentences.english: Straps to be secured with crimped steel seals.
sentences.chinese: 鋼帶應使用捲曲鋼密封以確保安全。

sentences.english: The cavitation erosion regularity of five steels of different heat treatments was studied using rotating disc testing equipment.
sentences.chinese: 在旋轉圓盤儀上對五種鋼的氣蝕破壞規律進行了研究。

sentences.english: The gas nitriding technology of H13 steel was studied by an orthogonal test.
sentences.chinese: 運用正交試驗法，研究H13鋼氣體滲氮工藝。

sentences.english: This machine permits the drawing-in of four harness of steel heddles, four banks of drop wires and a reed.
sentences.chinese: 這部機器可以穿四片綜框，四行仃經片和一個鋼筘。

definition: copper (chemistry)/see also 紅銅|红铜[hong2 tong2]/CL:塊|块[kuai4]
to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)
double-edged sword/CL:口[kou3],把[ba3]/classifier for blows of a sword
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
hammer/to hammer into shape/weight (e.g. of a steelyard or balance)/to strike with a hammer
to behead (as form of capital punishment)/to chop
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
